Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.GameEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Pipeline>
public final class GameEngine extends Object implements Iterable<Pipeline>
Central game management module. Serves as the link between entities with components containing data and systems specifying business logic. Updates a group of Pipelines. NOTE: sharing the same pipeline between engines can lead to undefined behavior.

    Constructs a new game engine updating pipelines.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameEngine

      public GameEngine(Pipeline... pipelines)
      Constructs a new game engine updating pipelines.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts this engine on the current thread if it is not currently active. An active game loop continuously updates its pipelines by speed-modified elapsed time per update cycle.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Halts execution of this engine if it is currently active.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns the active state of this engine.

    • getSpeed

      public double getSpeed()
      Returns the modifier applied to all pipelines' update timestep.

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed(double speed)
      Sets speed as the modifier applied to all pipelines' update timestep. A negative value effectively reverses time-aware pipelines. A 0 value effectively stops time-aware pipelines.

    • getEntities

      public EntityPool getEntities()
      Returns this engine's entity pool.

    • getSuspend

      public Suspend getSuspend()
      Returns this engine's suspend resource.

    • getSampler

      public Sampler getSampler()
      Returns this engine's sampler.

    • setPipelines

      public void setPipelines(Pipeline... pipelines)
      Detaches all current pipelines and attaches pipelines.

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of pipelines in engine.

    • iterator

      public Iterator<Pipeline> iterator()
      Returns an iterator over this engine's pipelines.
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Iterable<Pipeline>
